label: Excel Operations
description: Custom package for comprehensive Excel operations using Apache POI
createSession.label: Create Excel session
existingSession.label: Session name
existingSession.description: The name you gave the session when you opened it.
CreateWorkbook.label: Create workbook
CreateWorkbook.description: Creates a new Excel workbook at the specified path
CreateWorkbook.filePath.label: File path
CreateWorkbook.filePath.description: Use a file path compatible with the OS. Folder(s) will be created if it doesn't exist
CreateWorkbook.sheetName.label: Sheet name
CreateWorksheet.label: Create worksheet
CreateWorksheet.description: Adds a new worksheet to an existing workbook
CreateWorksheet.sheetName.label: Name for new worksheet
OpenWorkbook.label: Open
OpenWorkbook.description: Opens an existing workbook and returns a session for further use
OpenWorkbook.filePath.label: Workbook file path
OpenWorkbook.filePath.description: Path to an existing .xlsx or .xls file
OpenWorkbook.readOnly.label: Open as Read-Only
OpenWorkbook.readOnly.description: Open the workbook without allowing changes to be saved.
CloseWorkbook.label: Close
CloseWorkbook.description: Closes the workbook associated with the selected session, with an option to save changes.
CloseWorkbook.saveChanges.label: Save changes on close
CloseWorkbook.saveChanges.description: If enabled, writes any pending changes to the same file before closing.
DeleteWorksheet.label: Delete worksheet
DeleteWorksheet.description: Deletes the specified worksheet from the active workbook session.
DeleteWorksheet.sheetOption.label: Delete sheet by
DeleteWorksheet.sheetOption.index.label: Index
DeleteWorksheet.sheetOption.name.label: Name
GetWorksheetAsTable.label: Get worksheet as data table
GetWorksheetAsTable.description: Retrieves data from a worksheet and saves it in a table variable.
GetWorksheetAsTable.sheetOption.label: Enter worksheet name:
GetWorksheetAsTable.rowsOption.all.label: All rows
GetWorksheetAsTable.firstRow.label: From row
GetWorksheetAsTable.lastRow.label: To row
GetWorksheetAsTable.hasHeader.label: Sheet contains a header
GetWorksheetAsTable.readOption.label: Read option
FindNextEmptyCell.label: Find next empty cell
FindNextEmptyCell.traverseMode.label: Traverse by
FindNextEmptyCell.startMode.label: Start from
FindNextEmptyCell.startCell.label: Cell address
SwitchToSheet.label: Switch to sheet
SwitchToSheet.description: Activates a particular sheet in a Microsoft Excel file.
SwitchToSheet.mode.label: Activate sheet by
WriteTableToWorksheet.label: Write from data table
WriteTableToWorksheet.description: Write values from a data table into a worksheet.
WriteTableToWorksheet.dataTable.label: Enter data table variable
WriteTableToWorksheet.startCell.label: Specify the first cell
WriteTableToWorksheet.retainTypes.label: Retain cell data type
WriteTableToWorksheet.retainTypes.descri: If enabled keeps cells formatted as they were originally, otherwise clears the cell style before writing.
GetRowCount.label: Get number of rows
GetRowCount.description: Retrieves the number of rows that contain data.
GetRowCount.sheetSelect.label: Select worksheet by
GetRowCount.sheetSelect.byIndex.label: Index
GetRowCount.sheetSelect.byName.label: Name
GetRowCount.countMode.nonEmpty.label: Non-empty rows
GetRowCount.countMode.total.label: Total rows with data
SaveWorkbookAs.label: Save as
SaveWorkbookAs.description: Saves a copy of your workbook in the specified location. The session will always be on read-write mode after saving as a new path.
SaveWorkbookAs.destPath.label: File path
SaveWorkbookAs.destPath.description: Use a file path compatible with the OS. Folder(s) will be created if it doesn't exist.
SaveWorkbookAs.overwrite.label: Replace existing file
SaveWorkbookAs.updateSession.label: Update session to new path
SaveWorkbookAs.updateSession.description: If enabled, updates the session's current file path to the destination after saving.
SaveWorkbook.label: Save workbook
ModifyRowsColumns.label: Insert/Delete rows/columns
ModifyRowsColumns.node_label: Insert Rows at {{rowsTargetInsert}}|Delete Rows at {{rowsTargetDelete}}|Insert Columns at {{colsTargetInsert}}|Delete Columns at {{colsTargetDelete}}| - {{session}}
ModifyRowsColumns.description: Creates or removes rows or columns from the current worksheet.
ModifyRowsColumns.group.rows.label: Row operations
ModifyRowsColumns.group.cols.label: Column operations
ModifyRowsColumns.rows.insert.label: Insert Row(s) at
ModifyRowsColumns.rows.delete.label: Delete Row(s) at
ModifyRowsColumns.rows.target.descriptio: For single row e.g. 10 and for multiple rows e.g. 1:10.
ModifyRowsColumns.cols.insert.label: Insert Column(s) at
ModifyRowsColumns.cols.delete.label: Delete Column(s) at
ModifyRowsColumns.cols.target.descriptio: For single column e.g. B and for multiple columns e.g. B:D.
GetWorksheetNames.label: Get worksheet names
GetWorksheetNames.description: Retrieves the names of all the worksheets and assigns them to a list variable of string data type.
RenameWorksheet.label: Rename worksheet
RenameWorksheet.description: Renames a worksheet in the current workbook.
RenameWorksheet.select.label: Select worksheet by
RenameWorksheet.select.byIndex.label: Index
RenameWorksheet.select.byName.label: Name
RenameWorksheet.newName.label: Enter new name for worksheet
FilterWorksheetOrTable.label: Filter
FilterWorksheetOrTable.node_label: table {{tableName}}|sheet {{sheetName}}| on cell range {{wsRangeA1}}| on column name {{tableColumnName}}| on column position {{tableColumnIndexOneBased}}| on column name {{wsColumnName}}| on column position {{wsColumnIndexOneBased}}| number equals {{numValueEq}}| number does not equal {{numValueNeq}}| number greater than {{numValueGt}}| number greater or equal to {{numValueGte}}| number lower than {{numValueLt}}| number lower or equal to {{numValueLte}}| number between {{numValueBetween}} and {{numValueBetween2}}| text equals {{textValueEq}}| text does not equal {{textValueNeq}}| text begins with {{textValueBeg}}| text ends with {{textValueEnd}}| text contains {{textValueCon}}| text does not contain {{textValueNcon}}| - {{session}}
FilterWorksheetOrTable.description: Filter the data in a table or a worksheet.
FilterWorksheetOrTable.mode.table.label: Table
FilterWorksheetOrTable.table.name.label: Table name
FilterWorksheetOrTable.ws.name.label: Worksheet name
FilterWorksheetOrTable.ws.rangeAll.label: All cells
FilterWorksheetOrTable.filterType.label: Filter
SetCell.label: Set cell/range
SetCell.description: Writes a value or a formula to a cell or range; formulas start with “=” and autofill relatively across the selected range.
SetCell.target.label: Set cell/range value or formula for
SetCell.target.active.label: Active cell/range
SetCell.target.specific.label: Specific cell/range
SetCell.formula.label: Cell/range value or formula
SetCell.formula.description: Type a value or a formula starting with “=”. Formulas autofill by relative references across the range; use $ to keep absolute references (e.g., $A$1).
FindTextInSheet.label: Find
FindTextInSheet.description: Finds a specific string in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet.
FindTextInSheet.from.label: From
FindTextInSheet.to.label: To
FindTextInSheet.query.label: Find
FindTextInSheet.dir.label: Search direction
FindTextInSheet.matchCase.label: Match case
FindTextInSheet.matchWhole.label: Match entire cell contents
GetCellValue.label: Get single cell
GetCellValue.description: Retrieves the values from a single cell in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet and stores them in a string variable.
GetCellValue.targetMode.label: Cell option
GetCellValue.targetMode.active.label: Active cell
GetCellValue.targetMode.specific.label: Specific cell
GetCellValue.read.label: Read option
GetCellValue.read.visible.label: Read visible text in cell
GetCellValue.read.value.label: Read cell value
DeleteCellRange.label: Delete Cell/Range
DeleteCellRange.description: Deletes the active cell or a specific cell from the current worksheet.
DeleteCellRange.target.label: Cell option
DeleteCellRange.target.active.label: Active cell/range
DeleteCellRange.target.specific.label: Specific cell/range
DeleteCellRange.option.label: Delete option
DeleteCellRange.option.shiftLeft.label: Shift cells left
DeleteCellRange.option.shiftUp.label: Shift cells up
DeleteCellRange.option.entireRow.label: Entire row
DeleteCellRange.option.entireCol.label: Entire column
SetActiveCell.label: Go to cell
SetActiveCell.description: Moves the cursor to a specific cell in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet, if a range is provided the top-leftmost cell will be activated.
SetActiveCell.mode.label: Cell option
SetActiveCell.mode.specific.label: Specific cell
SetActiveCell.mode.active.label: Active cell
GetCellAddress.label: Get cell address
GetCellAddress.description: Retrieves the location of the active cell and stores it to a string variable.
GetCellAddress.return.label: Save the active or user specified cell address in local variable
GetCellAddress.mode.label: Cell option
GetCellAddress.mode.active.label: Active cell
GetCellAddress.mode.specific.label: Specific cell
GetCellAddress.columnTitle.label: Column title
GetCellAddress.columnTitle.description: Text to match in the header row (first non-empty row).
GetCellAddress.position.label: Position under header (1-based)
GetCellAddress.position.description: Row position below the header in the matched column; 1 means the first data row under the header.
GoToNextEmptyCell.label: Go to next empty cell
GoToNextEmptyCell.description: Finds the next empty cell in the current worksheet. You can specify whether to find the empty cell toward the left, right, up, or down.
GoToNextEmptyCell.mode.label: Start from
GoToNextEmptyCell.mode.active.label: Active Cell
GoToNextEmptyCell.mode.specific.label: Specific Cell
GoToNextEmptyCell.dir.label: Towards
GetCurrentWorksheetName.label: Get current worksheet name
GetCurrentWorksheetName.description: Retrieves the name of the current worksheet and assigns it to a string variable.
GetCurrentWorksheetName.return.label: Assign the output to variable
SortWorksheetOrTable.label: Sort
SortWorksheetOrTable.node_label: the table {{tableName}}|the sheet {{sheetName}}| for column {{tableColumnName}}| on range {{wsRangeA1}}| for column {{wsColumnName}}| for column at index {{tableColumnIndexOneBased}}| for column at index {{wsColumnIndexOneBased}}| from {{numberOrder}}| from {{textOrder}}| - {{session}}
SortWorksheetOrTable.description: Sorts rows in a table or worksheet range by a chosen column using numeric or text order.
SortWorksheetOrTable.mode.label: Data source
SortWorksheetOrTable.mode.description: Select whether to sort a table or a worksheet range.
SortWorksheetOrTable.mode.table.label: Table
SortWorksheetOrTable.table.name.label: Table name
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.name.label: Worksheet name
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.rangeMode.label: Cell range
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.rangeAll.label: All cells
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.rangeText.label: Range
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.colByName.label: Column name
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.colByIndex.label: Column position
SortWorksheetOrTable.ws.hasHeader.label: Data has headers
SortWorksheetOrTable.sortType.label: Sort order
SortWorksheetOrTable.sortType.text.label: Text
